ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fundalini Pages: Quickie satirical tidbits, gags, and cartoons focusing on people, places, and things in politics and pop culture.
Harry Plodder Has Gotta Retire: A Movie parody of Harry Potter And The Goblet Of Fire.
Everyday Pet-Peeves Of Second Rate Superheroes: Gags featuring the little things that bother lesser known superheroes.
7 Periods Closer To Death: Derin learns what Phyla means.
Monroe and… The Mystery Cream Part One: After his Grandpa gives him Mexican Miracle Cream for his sore feet, Monroe gets super feet and wins a big football game with a long field goal.
Spy vs. Spy: White Spy falls for Black Spy's super helium balloon weight trap.
From The Case Files Of Wanda Goldstein Flenkman: Animal Psychologist: Gags featuring animals telling their problems to a psychologist.
Spy vs. Spy: Black Spy falls for White Spy's water walkers trap.
A Mad Look At Cell Phones: Sergio Aragones' textless gags featuring cell phone situations.
Extreme Once-Over Home Repitition: A parody of the TV series Extreme Make-Over Home Edition.
One Fine Morning In The Windy City: Donald Trump puts the finishing touches on Trump Tower Chicago.
Drawn Out Dramas: Sergio Aragones' mini textless gags that appear in various margins and panels on most of the pages in the magazine.
